subject: This Weekend on BBC Sport
body:
BBC SPORT BBC Daily E-mail Other e-mail newsletters GABBY LOGAN ON INSIDE SPORT Hi everyone - Gabby here. We've got our second Monday edition of Inside Sport going out on BBC ONE at 2305 BST tonight. (I hope you caught our first Sunday morning show yesterday but if you didn't, try to tune in next week at 1130 BST, BBC TWO.) Tonight I meet Britain's number one tennis player Andy Murray. I met up with him at the new Roehampton tennis centre and watched him knocking up with Tim Henman. I also met his coach Brad Gilbert. I'm a rubbish tennis player so you won't see me attempting to return one of those fierce Murray serves but I did work out with him and just about managed to keep up! Andy is a really interesting guy - he spoke about his life on the tennis tour, his pride in his brother Jamie's achievements, about Wimbledon and about the sacrifices he has had to make to get to the top. Also on the programme, Britain's top paralympian, Tanni Grey Thompson is retiring and we reveal one of her new goals in life - to help search out the paralympians for London 2012. She thinks she might find them among the servicemen and women injured in action in Iraq and Afghanistan. All that and Des Kelly and Steve Bunce to debate the hot topics of the week. Join me BBC ONE, 2305 BST tonight. Gabby hosts Inside Sport on Monday 7 May, 2305 BST on BBC ONE, and second edition, 13 May, 1130 BST on BBC TWO. If you miss the show, you can catch up on the best bits on the website, bbc.co.uk/insidesport COMING UP THIS WEEK ON BBC SPORT... WORLD SNOOKER bbc.co.uk/snooker Coverage from the Crucible of the World Snooker Final on BBC TWO, Monday 1500-2300 MATCH OF THE DAY - WOMEN'S FA CUP FINAL bbc.co.uk/matchoftheday Coverage of Arsenal v Charlton from the City Ground, Nottingham on BBC ONE, Monday 1240-1510. Live audio commentary also available on Radio Five Live and BBC website from 1300 (UK users only). PREMIERSHIP FOOTBALL bbc.co.uk/football Charlton v Tottenham audio commentary: 2000 BST, Radio Five Live and BBC website (UK users only) SCOTTISH PREMIER LEAGUE FOOTBALL bbc.co.uk/sportscotland Audio commentary: 2000 BST, Dunfermline v Motherwell SUPER LEAGUE SHOW bbc.co.uk/rugbyleague BBC ONE North, Monday 2235-2305. Video coverage also available on the BBC website from 2235 (UK users only). INSIDE SPORT bbc.co.uk/insidesport Gabby Logan hosts the big names and stories on BBC ONE, Monday 2305-2345 RUGBY bbc.co.uk/rugby Radio Wales, Tuesday 1930-2115 MATCH OF THE DAY bbc.co.uk/matchoftheday Premiership highlights on BBC ONE, Wednesday 2310-2350 SCRUM V bbc.co.uk/scrumv Fri 1900-2100, BBC TWO Wales, BBCi and website. Service available throughout the UK. Not available on Freeview. THIS WEEKEND ON BBC SPORT  All the TV and radio times FOOTBALL ON THE BBC  bbc.co.uk/football Saturday Football Focus (1210, BBC ONE). Sunday Score (1430, BBCi & BBC Sport website); Final Score (1630, BBC ONE); Match of the Day (2220, BBC ONE). MORE SPORT ON THE BBC  bbc.co.uk/tvandradio Saturday Motorsport: Sports Extra Formula One (0955 and 1255, Radio Five Live Sports Extra). Rugby League: Challenge Cup Round 5 - Leeds v Wigan (1430, BBC ONE and Radio Five Live); Rugby League Forum (1630, BBCi and BBC website). Racing: From Ascot (1310, 1345, and 1420, BBC ONE) and Haydock (1325, 1400, BBC ONE). Sunday Rugby Union: Premiership Rugby (1300, BBC TWO and BBC website). Rugby League: Challenge Cup Round 5 - Wakefield v Bradford (1345, BBC TWO and BBC website). Paralympic World Cup: 1545, BBC TWO.
...AND ON THE WEBSITE THIS WEEK  bbc.co.uk/sport Watch Inside Sport  Download the best bits of the show Win FA Cup final tickets  Enter Inside Sport's photography competition To make changes or cancel your newsletter visit: http://www.bbc.co.uk/email/sport_newsletter To sign up for other newsletters or the personalised BBC Daily E-mail visit: http://www.bbc.co.uk/email If you have an editorial related comment, e-mail mailto:sport.online@bbc.co.uk?subject=newsletter Problems with links?
